import React, { Component} from 'react' import {add} from './addtocart' import {view} from './addtocart' import pro1 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/1.jpg' import pro2 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/2.jpg' import pro3 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/3.jpg' import pro4 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/4.jpg' import pro5 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/5.jpg' import pro6 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/6.jpg' import pro7 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/7.jpg' import pro8 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/8.jpg' import pro9 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/9.jpg' import pro10 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/10.jpg' import pro11 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/11.jpg' import pro12 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/12.jpg' import pro13 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/13.jpg' import pro14 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/14.jpg' import pro15 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/15.jpg' import pro16 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/16.jpg' import pro17 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/17.jpg' import pro18 from '../img/MenFashion/shirts/18.jpg' import MyHeader from './header'; import Navigation from './navigation' import Footer from './footer' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './css/rangeSlider.css' import BeautyStars from "beauty-stars"; const products=[ { id:'MS1', pro:pro1, name:'Shirt', rating:3, price:600 }, { id:'MS2', pro:pro2, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:500 }, { id:'MS3', pro:pro3, name:'shirt', rating:0, price:700 }, { id:'MS4', pro:pro4, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:550 }, { id:'MS5', pro:pro5, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS6', pro:pro6, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:800 }, { id:'MS7', pro:pro7, name:'Shirt', rating:4, // rating7:0, price:400 }, { id:'MS8', pro:pro8, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating8:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS9', pro:pro9, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:850 }, { id:'MS1', pro:pro1, name:'Shirt', rating:3, // rating10:0, price:400 }, { id:'R1', pro:pro1, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS2', pro:pro2, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:650 }, {id:'MS10', pro:pro10, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:650 }, { id:'MS11', pro:pro11, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:650 }, { id:'MS12', pro:pro12, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:650 }, { id:'MS13', pro:pro13, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:650 }, { id:'MS14', pro:pro14, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS15', pro:pro15, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:800 }, { id:'MS16', pro:pro16, name:'Shirt', rating:4, // rating7:0, price:400 }, { id:'MS17', pro:pro17, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating8:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS18', pro:pro18, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:850 }, ] var filteredProducts=[ { id:'MS1', pro:pro1, name:'Shirt', rating:3, price:650 }, { id:'MS2', pro:pro2, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:500 }, { id:'MS3', pro:pro3, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:700 }, { id:'MS4', pro:pro4, name:'Shirt', rating:0, price:550 }, { id:'MS5', pro:pro5, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:600 }, { id:'MS6', pro:pro6, name:'Shirt', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:800 }, ] export default class extends Component{ state = { minvalue:0, maxvalue:5000, p1value: products[0]['rating'], p2value: products[1]['rating'], p3value: products[2]['rating'] , p4value: products[3]['rating'], p5value: products[4]['rating'], p6value: products[5]['rating'], p7value: products[6]['rating'], p8value: products[7]['rating'], p9value: products[8]['rating'], p10value: products[9]['rating'], p11value: products[10]['rating'],}; constructor(props){ super(props); this.filtered = this.filtered.bind(this); } forceUpdateHandler(){ this.forceUpdate(); }; clear(){ document.getElementById('price-min').innerHTML=0 +' PKR'; document.getElementById('price-max').innerHTML=5000 +' PKR'; document.getElementById('size').value="N/A"; } changeGender(id){ document.getElementById('gender').innerHTML=document.getElementById(id).innerHTML; } changeSize(size){ document.getElementById('size').innerHTML=document.getElementById(size).innerHTML; } filtered(j=0){ var x=0; var total=document.getElementById('show').value; filteredProducts=[] if(j==0){ var min=document.getElementById('price-min').innerHTML; var max=document.getElementById('price-max').innerHTML; for (var i=0;i=Number(min.split(" ")[0]) && Number(products[i]['price']) <=Number(max.split(" ")[0]) && x < div className="section">
